refbody.section: Purpose Retrieve the IP address, or addresses that are being used by the SSH service on the appliance.

ul.li: This command is the same as the status sshhost command.

This value shows all IP addresses that are being used by SSH connections. This value might be different from the value that is retrieved when the get SSHHost is run. For example, an IP address that is set to accept SSH connections might be unavailable because the ethernet interface is disabled, or the IP address is not configured on the appliance.

refbody.section: ExampleView the IP address that the SSH service is using, by typing the following command: sshhost status EnabledSSHHost = 192.0.2.0,192.0.2.12,
